title: [SKIN CONCEPT] Elderwood Kayle
body:
I absolutely love everything that has to do with the Elderwood skins and the woody/foresty/mmm idea behind all of them.  Unfortunately, I play none of the champs with Elderwood skins :^)

Since I am a {{champion:10}}  main, I whipped this out of my ass because it seemed like a nice idea. Also this is my first _""""concept""""_.

**The _"""""concept"""""_**
I noticed how all the Elderwood skins have a more or less specific theme to each of them and I thought the whole rose-thorny thing would fit Kayle for relatable reasons. You know, angel of judgement. Pretty but can also _hurt you really bad_. Stuff like that. 

Her armor colour scheme is based off of [what rosewood trees look like when sectioned.](http://essentialoilslondon.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/02/newly-felled-rosewood-tree.jpg)

Upon further doodling and letting the ideas flow, I realised that this would be quite the 1350rp skin right here ⁽ʳᶦᵍʰᵗ ʰᵉʳᵉ⁾

In the image she is with her E active, so the idea is that instead of the flaming flames of justice she gets normally, in this case she gets thorny roses on her sword and for that crown thing. 
I also imagine her ult to look like thorny vines engulfing you safely into a thorny ball of "eff y'all". 

I yet have no idea what her Q or W would look like, because, as previously stated, 
> I whipped this out of my ass



And that's it, I guess. Had fun designing this. 
Currently having an idea for Ascended Sivir but that'll be way later lol.
kbye

replies.body:
http://lolwp.com/wp-content/uploads/Blackthorn-Morgana.jpg

You dare Challenge me over dominion of the thorn sister?
